name: 2020 - The year of: "PLEASE MAKE IT STOP"
name_original: 2020 - The year of: "PLEASE MAKE IT STOP"
description:
2020 has been a mess, from killer Japanese hornets invading the western world, angry koalas surviving the Australian bushfires, and Covid-19. They already got all the antelopes, how long can you survive? 

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move.
- Use mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
